item.title: Mutual Aid Requests
item.description: Introduction Mutual aid requests are critical to the survival of chronically ill and/or disabled people. Being disabled and sick is expensive, and benefits are almost never enough to cover the cost of living and medical expenses which are outright extortion in the United States. Detailed below are mutual aid requests for chronically ill and/or disabled people. How to be Added You do NOT need to be on the disabled.social server to have your request added.
